english.segment1: I tasted fruit that was forbidden. I murdered trust that you had given. And now I'm living in a place that's not my home
english.segment2: The pain in your heart made you regret. The moment we spoke, did you forget?. Will my transgressions bring us all to our sweet end?
english.segment3: Maybe I'm just being too hard on myself. I don't know. Or is it that your mercy is much more than I deserve?
english.segment4: Betrayed by more than just a kiss. I did much more I must admit. Instead of letting it all end you bring new hope.
